SwitchPreference.android:title: No wake on charge
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable wake up when (dis)connecting USB cable

SwitchPreference.android:title: Battery history XXL
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Enlarge the stock settings battery history - from 10 to 30 records. For Android 4.4/5.x/6.0

SwitchPreference.android:title: Native freezer
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable and re-enable any 3rd party app from system Settings. For Android 4.4/5.x/6.0/7.x

SwitchPreference.android:title: Pocket first (option when sharing)
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Make Pocket the first option when sharing. For Pocket on Android 5.x/6.0/7.x

SwitchPreference.android:title: Media stream default
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Prefer media instead of ringer during volume control. For Android 5.x/6.0/7.x

SwitchPreference.android:title: Advanced volume keys
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Long press VOLUME -/+ for PLAY_PAUSE/NEXT when screen is off or showing lock screen. Long press Volume + toggles flashlight when music is not playing. For Android 5.x/6.0/7.x

SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable USB notifications
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Get rid of a notifications shown when phone is plugged to a computer

SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable ADB notifications
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Get rid of the USB debugging notification

SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable network monitored notification
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Hide the 'Network may be monitored' / 'Certificate authority installed' notification. For Android 5.x/6.0/7.x

SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable battery prediction
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Do not plot estimated battery usage to graph. For Android 5.x/6.0

SwitchPreference.android:title: Allow APK downgrade
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow installing older APK, works around 'INSTALL_FAILED_VERSION_DOWNGRADE'. For Android 7.x
